price: Ni ukuri, Umuvugishwamana Musa (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah) yarabazaniye ibitangaro bigaragara vyemeza ukuri kwiwe[12], hamwe n’ivyo rero mwafashe igishusho c’inyana y’inka mwibumbiye muragisenga mu nyuma y’aho Musa agiriye kw’isezerano ryo kuvugana n’Imana Allah, mu gihe mwari abirenganije mu gusenga ibintazi.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَكُم مُّوسَىٰ بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمُ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ وَأَنتُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ
footnotes: [12] Ivyo bitangaro bikaba vyari ibi bikurikira: ihinduka ry’inkoni ikaba inzoka amahanga, gusayangana kw’ikiganza mu gihe agikuye mu kwaha, itera ry’amapfa, ikeha ry’umwimbu w’ivyamwa, itera ry’imyuzurire y’amazi, itera ry’inzige, itera ry’udukoko turya ico ari co cose duhuye na co, itera ry’ibikere bikwiragiye hose n’ihinduka ry’ibinyobwa bigacika amaraso.

meta.transliteration: walaqad jāakum mūsā bil-bayināti thumma ittakhadhtumu al-ʿij'la min baʿdihi wa-antum ẓālimūna
